SEARCH
Package main.app

Class OfficerHandler

java.lang.Object
main.app.OfficerHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserHandler
public class OfficerHandler extends Object implements IUserHandler
Handles all CLI interactions for an HDB Officer. Combines officer tasks like registration and booking with optional applicant functions.
